title: [SDMP 0.10.1](http://sdmp.github.io/) Core Resource Schema
description: Schema for the core resources of the SDMP. All resources published within the SDMP must conform to this schema.

sdmp.description: Root property defining the SDMP resource.

version.description: Version of SDMP used to create the resource, and which must be used to validate the resource. The property must be a valid [semver number](http://semver.org/).

publisher.description: The [key fingerprint](TODO) of the user or node publishing the resource. This is equivalent to the SHA-512 of the public key, whose octets are [unpadded base64url](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-5) encoded.

created.description: Timestamp the resource was published. The time must be the local time of the publisher, translated to UTC. The timestamp is ISO-8601 formatted, with granularity to the millisecond.

updates.description: The resources which this resource overrides. All resources in this list must be published by the publisher of this current resource.

items.description: The [resource identifier](TODO) of the resource being overridden. This is equivalent to the SHA-512 used to sign the resource, whose octets are [unpadded base64url](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-5) encoded.

schemas.description: The schemas used in this resource.

items.description: Must be a valid URI which points to a valid schema.
